org.rundeck.storage.api

Interface Tree<T extends ContentMeta>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SelectiveTree<T>, StoragePlugin, StorageTree
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseDelegateTree, ConverterTree, DelegateTree, EmptyTree, FileTree, ListenerTree, LockingTree, MemoryTree, StorageTreeImpl, StringToPathTree, SubPathTree, TreeStack

    public interface Tree<T extends ContentMeta>
    Stores content in a hierarchy
